questions.question: Which of the following is NOT an example of Interconnection?
What is meant by the digital divide

choices.answer: The border between North and South Korea
A computer virus invented in Russia
The global disparity  in access to the intenet and ICT
Another term for the Great Dividing Range

questions.question: What is the value of trade between nations?

choices.answer: A good or service made in one country and sold overseas
A duty charged on overseas goods
A good or service purchased from another country

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a service provided by the internet

choices.answer: Communications such as email and social media apps

questions.question: By what means is 90% of world trade goods transported?

choices.answer: A company that has a payroll above $5 million per annum
A company that makes high tech products
A company that operates across international borders
A company that employs over one million people

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a multinational Company?
What is meant by Gross Domestic Product?

choices.answer: The total value of goods and services produced in a country
A poorly manufactured or unethically produced product

questions.question: What is one of the reasons why multinational companies make their goods overseas?

choices.answer: To promote development and alleviate poverty
To improve international relations and understanding
To take advantage of lower employee wages

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a con or disadvantage of Multinational Companies?

choices.answer: Does not always abide by environmental safeguards
Does not result in improved wages and conditions
Does not always pay its fair share of taxes
